summary: Blacksmiths now sell all weapons and armor up to ebony.  You can choose from the beginning whether to spend money on your first house, or a really good sword.
descriptionHtml:
Blacksmiths now sell all weapons and armor up to ebony.  You can choose from the beginning whether to spend money on your first house, or a really good sword.

Also included is something to improve Eorlund\'s stock.  He is the only merchant set to sell daedric and dragon gear.  As he\'s the only one with supply, the price is increased... quite a bit.  It will not be easy to afford this gear early on.  These things have a base price comparable to the homes, some above that.  

This mod includes dragonbone weapons, so Dawnguard is required.

Finally, messing around I switched one of the 3 heroes you meet later in the game so they have dragonbone gear.  Not really that important of a change though.
author: brpratts
